property.name: Text
property.value: You begin the game with Sophie (In Loving Memory) in play. ι After damage is placed on a card you control: Draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.) ε effect: +1 for each damage on Mark Harrigan.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards (κ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Tactic cards level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): The Home Front, Shell Shock, Sophie, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After an investigator at your location commits a card to a skill test: That card gains a ΰ icon until the end of the test. (Limit once for each investigator per round.) ε effect: +1. You may choose a skill card committed to this skill test to return to its owner's hand after this test ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards (λ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Survivor cards (ξ) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Analytical Mind, The King in Yellow (Act 1), 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When you would draw your opening hand: Draw 13 cards, instead. Choose up to 5 events to place beneath this card and keep 8 cards as your opening hand. Discard the rest. (You cannot mulligan.) η: Choose an event beneath this card and draw it. Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. ε effect: +3. You may choose an event beneath this card and draw it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 33. Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards (ν) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Mystic cards (μ) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 3 copies of The Painted World, 1 copy of Stars of Hyades, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your assets with "uses (charges)" enter play with 1 additional charge on them. ε effect: +1. Add 1 charge to an asset with "uses (charges)" you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards (μ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, cards with "uses (charges)" level 0-4, Occult cards level 0. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Spirit-Speaker, Angered Spirits, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you defeat an enemy: Play an asset from your discard pile (paying its cost). (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +2. If this test is successful, return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards (ξ) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, Guardian cards (κ) level 0-2. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Bury Them Deep, Graveyard Ghouls, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you draw your opening hand: Choose a role (ξ, κ, λ, ν, μ, or Neutral). You can only play, commit, or trigger abilities on Neutral cards or cards of your role. θ: Switch your role. (Limit once per round.) ε effect: +2. You may switch roles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck size: 35. Deckbuilding Options: Survivor, Guardian, Seeker, Rogue, and Mystic cards (ξ, κ, λ, ν, and μ) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 copies of Improvisation, 2 copies of Crisis of Identity, 1 random basic weakness. Additional Requirements: Your deck must include at least 7 cards each from 3 different classes (ξ, κ, λ, ν, or μ).

property.name: Text
property.value: Mark Harrigan deck only. If this skill is successful during an attack, move 1 damage from Mark Harrigan to the attacked enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - For every 2 damage on you, take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mark Harrigan deck only. Sophie cannot leave play. θ Take 1 direct damage: You get +2 to your skill value for this skill test. Forced - If Mark Harrigan has 5 or more damage on him: Flip Sophie.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sophie cannot leave play. You get -1 to each of your skills. Forced - If Mark Harrigan has 4 or less damage on him: Flip Sophie.

property.name: Text
property.value: Minh Thi Phan deck only. You may commit 1 card to each skill test performed by an investigator at another location. ι After you commit exactly 1 card to a skill test, exhaust Analytical Mind: Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put The King in Yellow into play in your threat area. It cannot leave play except through the ι ability below. You cannot commit exactly 1 or 2 cards to a skill test. ι After a skill test is successful in which Minh Thi Phan has committed at least 6 matching skill icons for that test: Discard The King in Yellow.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sefina Rousseau deck only. Cannot be placed beneath Sefina Rousseau. Play The Painted World as an exact copy of a non-exceptional event that is beneath Sefina Rousseau. Remove The Painted World from the game instead of discarding it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Randomly choose an event beneath Sefina Rousseau and remove it from the game. If you cannot, take 1 damage and 1 horror. If your deck has 5 or more cards in it, shuffle Stars of Hyades back into your deck instead of discarding it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Akachi Onyele deck only. θ Exhaust Spirit-Speaker: Choose an asset you control with "uses (charges)." Either return that asset to your hand, or move all charges from that asset to your resource pool (as resources) and discard that asset.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Angered Spirits into play in your threat area. θ Exhaust a Spell asset: Move 1 charge from that asset to Angered Spirits. Forced - When the game ends, if Angered Spirits has fewer than 4 charges on it: You suffer 1 physical trauma.

property.name: Text
property.value: William Yorick deck only. Fast. Play after a non-Elite enemy at your location is defeated. Add that enemy (and this card) to the victory display.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - William Yorick only. Hunter. While Graveyard Ghouls is engaged with you, cards cannot leave your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lola Hayes deck only. Fast. Play only during your turn. Switch your role. Until the end of your turn, reduce the resource cost of the next card you play of your role by 3. Draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Discard all cards you control of your current role. Then, discard the top card of your deck. Switch your role to the class of the discarded card (if the discarded card is a weakness, switch your role to neutral).

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (6 ammo). η Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You deal +1 damage for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: True Grit may be assigned damage dealt to other investigators at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play after another investigator draws a non-peril encounter card, but before resolving that card's effects. You are considered to have drawn that encounter card, instead. You get +2 to each of your skills while resolving that card's revelation effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: One at a time, play up to 3 assets from your hand, reducing the resource cost of each by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you move to a location, if that location has at least 1 clue on it, exhaust Fieldwork: You get +2 skill value for the next skill test you perform this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Discard a card with at least 1 έ skill icon from your hand: Place 1 resource on Archaic Glyphs from the token pool, as a secret. Forced - After the third secret is placed on Archaic Glyphs: Discard Archaic Glyphs and gain 5 resources. Record in your Campaign Log that "you have translated the glyphs."

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an investigator at your location. That investigator searches the top 6 cards of his or her deck for a card, draws it, and shuffles his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 secrets). η Spend 1 secret: Investigate. Investigate any revealed location in play as if you were at that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: η Exhaust Stealth: Evade. The chosen enemy gets -2 evade for this evasion attempt. If you successfully evade the enemy, disengage with it but do not exhaust it. Until the end of your turn, that enemy cannot engage you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play only during your turn. Put an Item asset into play from your hand. At the end of your turn, if that asset is still in play, return it to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Play when you would succeed at a skill test. You get +2 skill value for this test.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 supplies). If Lockpicks has no supplies, discard it. η Exhaust Lockpicks: Investigate. Add your ί value to your skill value for this investigation. If you do not succeed by at least 2, remove 1 supply from Lockpicks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Uses (3 charges). η Exhaust Alchemical Transmutation, spend 1 charge: Test ά (1). For each point you succeed by, gain 1 resource (to a maximum of 3). If a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol is revealed during this test, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play a Spell or Ritual card from your hand, reducing its resource cost by 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move. Move to any revealed location and reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If you reveal a α, β, γ, δ, or ζ symbol, you must discard an Item or Ally asset you control (if you cannot, take 1 damage).

property.name: Text
property.value: θ During a skill test on a Spell card, exhaust Spirit Athame: You get +2 skill value for this test. η Exhaust Spirit Athame: Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Investigate. Your location gets -1 shroud for this investigation. η Discard Lantern: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Fight. You get +2 ή for this attack. η Discard Gravedigger's Shovel: Discover 1 clue at your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Fast. Attach Hiding Spot to any location. Each non-Elite enemy at attached location gains aloof. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase, if a ready enemy is at attached location: Discard Hiding Spot.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this skill test is successful, choose a ξ card not named Resourceful in your discard pile. Add the chosen card to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Draw the top card of the encounter deck. That card gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Drawing the Sign into play in your threat area. Your maximum hand size is reduced by 5 while checking your hand size during the upkeep phase. ηη: Discard Drawing the Sign.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Location farthest from you. Prey - Bearer only. Hunter. Forced - When The Thing That Follows would be defeated: Instead shuffle it into its bearer's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Easy / Standard α -1 (-3 instead if you have 3 or more horror on you). β γ δ -4. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hard / Expert α -X, where X is the amount of horror on you. (If you have no horror on you, X is 1.) β γ δ -5. If your location has at least 1 horror on it, take 1 horror (from the token pool). If your location has no horror on it, place 1 horror on it instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search all set-aside cards and the victory display for the Royal Emissary enemy, and spawn it in the Theatre.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Royal Emissary is added to the victory display: Remove all doom from play and reset the agenda deck to agenda 1a. Then, place 3 doom on that agenda.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator takes 100 horror (cannot be prevented).

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of the set-aside locations, at random. Put that location into play, and spawn the set-aside The Man in the Pallid Mask enemy at that location (instead of his normal spawn location). Advance to one of the 3 copies of act 2a, at random. Remove the other 2 copies of act 2a from the game without looking at them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be discarded from play, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Instead of discarding The Man in the Pallid Mask, move him to the Lobby. Add 2 β tokens to the chaos bag. Place 1 horror on the Theatre. Until the end of the scenario, horror on locations represents spreading flames, and each location with horror gains: "Forced - After you enter this location or end your turn at this location: Test ί (3). If you fail, take 1 damage. (Limit once per round.)" Keep this card next to the act deck as a reminder, and advance to act 3a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be discarded from play, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Instead of discarding The Man in the Pallid Mask, move him to the Lobby. Add 2 γ tokens to the chaos bag. Place 1 horror on the location The Man in the Pallid Mask was moved from. Until the end of the scenario, horror on locations represents the advancing ooze, and each location with horror gains: "Forced - After you leave this location: Test ί (4). If you fail, take 1 horror and 1 damage." Keep this card next to the act deck as a reminder, and advance to act 3a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Objective - When The Man in the Pallid Mask would be discarded from play, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Instead of discarding The Man in the Pallid Mask, move him to the Lobby. Add 2 δ tokens to the chaos bag. Place 1 horror on each Private location. Until the end of the scenario, horror on locations represents flooding water, and each location with horror gains: "Forced - When you would leave this location: Test ί (2). If you fail, take 1 damage and cancel the effects of the move. (Limit once per round.)" Keep this card next to the act deck as a reminder, and advance to act 3a.

property.name: Text
property.value: While The Man in the Pallid Mask is not in play, the Lobby gains: "η: Resign." Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 horror on each location with no horror that is connected to a location with horror. Objective - If each undefeated investigator has resigned, advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: The investigators must decide (choose one): - We have to warn the police about what's going on! (→R1) - The police won't believe us. We have to solve this mystery on our own. (→R2)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Lobby is revealed: Put 2 of the set-aside Lobby Doorway locations into play, at random. η η: Draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you perform a move action during which you move from the Balcony to the Theatre: Take 2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When Backstage is revealed: Put 2 of the set-aside Backstage Doorway locations into play, at random. While you are at Backstage, each hidden treachery in your hand counts as 3 cards instead of 1 for the purposes of counting your hand size.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you are in the Lighting Box, increase the resource cost of each card in your hand by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Gain 5 resources. Remember that you "stole from the box office." (Group limit once per game.)

property.name: Text
property.value: η Investigate. You get +3 έ for this investigation. After this skill test ends, discard each card in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you succeed by 2 or more while investigating the Rehearsal Room: Take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you reveal the Trap Room: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Swarm of Rats and put it into play engaged with you (2 copies instead if there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game). Shuffle the encounter deck if it is searched.

card.name: The Man in the Pallid Mask

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Location farthest from all investigators. Aloof. η: Investigate. Your location gets +2 shroud for this investigation. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues, defeat The Man in the Pallid Mask.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Lowest ά. Massive. Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - At the end of the enemy phase: Each investigator at Royal Emissary's location or a connecting location takes 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Easy / Standard α Reveal another token. If you fail, place 1 doom on a Lunatic enemy in play. β -2. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location. γ: -4. If you fail, take 1 horror. δ: -X. X is the shroud value of your location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hard / Expert α Reveal another token. If you fail, place 1 doom on the Lunatic enemy in play with the most remaining health. β -3. Place 1 of your clues on your location. γ -4. Take 1 horror. δ -X. X is the shroud value of your location. If you fail, take 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Find the Bystander asset with the fewest clues on it. Spawn the set-aside Dianne Devine enemy at that asset's location. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When this agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold: Instead, remove all doom in play and randomly resolve one of the Sickening Reality cards underneath the scenario reference card. If there are no cards underneath the scenario reference card, advance to agenda 2b instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - When an investigator is eliminated (by defeat or resignation): Place each of that investigator's clues on this act, instead of placing them at his or her location. Objective - Find as many clues as you can, then get out of this awful place!

property.name: Text
property.value: Madness. noun. mad.ness. The state of being mentally ill, especially severely. - Extremely foolish behavior. - A state of frenzied or chaotic activity. - Why are you looking at this side? - There is no reason to flip to Act 1b. - Flip back to Act 1a.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Constance Dumaine's location takes 1 horror.Move each clue from Constance Dumaine to her location.Flip this card to its enemy side, and switch it with the Bystander asset version of Constance Dumaine, removing that version from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter.While Constance Dumaine is exhuasted, she gets +3 fight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Jordan Perry's location takes 1 horror.Move each clue from Jordan Perry to his location.Flip this card to its enemy side, and switch it with the Bystander asset version of Jordan Perry, removing that version from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter.Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase: Heal 1 damage from Jordan Perry.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Ishimaru Haruko's location takes 1 horror.Move each clue from Ishimaru Haruko to her location.Flip this card to its enemy side, and switch it with the Bystander asset version of Ishimaru Haruko, removing that version from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter.Forced - After you deal damage to Ishimaru Haruko by an effect other than an attack: Draw the top card of the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Sebastien Moreau's location takes 1 horror.Move each clue from Sebastien Moreau to his location.Flip this card to its enemy side, and switch it with the Bystander asset version of Sebastien Moreau, removing that version from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter. Retaliate.Sebastien Moreau's attacks cannot be canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each investigator at Ashleigh Clarke's location takes 1 horror.Move each clue from Ashleigh Clarke to her location.Flip this card to its enemy side, and switch it with the Bystander asset version of Ashleigh Clarke, removing that version from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hunter.Each investigator at Ashleigh Clarke's location does not draw cards during the upkeep phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Resign. Having found valuable information about the production, you depart and plan your next move. (If each undefeated investigator has resigned, proceed to "if no resolution was reached" in the Campaign Guide.)

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you perform a parley action in the Ballroom: Gain 2 resources. (Group limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: ι After you perform a parley action in the Living Room: Draw 1 card. (Group limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you end your turn at the Gallery: Test ά (2). If you fail, place 1 of your clues on the Gallery.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After you enter the Courtyard: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is an enemy, draw it.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Heal 1 horror. Then, reveal a random token from the chaos bag. If a α or ζ symbol is revealed, take 1 horror and place 1 doom on the Dining Room.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Parley. Test έ (3) to ask Constance about the play. If you succeed, take control of 1 of the clues on Constance Dumaine. Forced - When the last clue is removed from Constance Dumaine: Flip this card over and resolve its text.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remember that you "interviewed Constance."Flip this card back over to its Bystander asset side.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you have 10 or more resources: Parley. Test έ (2) to fraternize with Jordan. If you succeed, take control of 1 of the clues on Jordan Perry. Forced - When the last clue is removed from Jordan Perry: Flip this card over and resolve its text.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remember that you "interviewed Jordan."Flip this card back over to its Bystander asset side.

property.name: Text
property.value: η If you have 6 or more cards in your hand: Parley. Test ά (2) to question Haruko about the play. If you succeed, take control of 1 of the clues on Ishimaru Haruko. Forced - When the last clue is removed from Ishimaru Haruko: Flip this card over and resolve its text.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remember that you "interviewed Haruko."Flip this card back over to its Bystander asset side.

property.name: Text
property.value: η: Parley. Test ά (3) to get information about the production from Sebastien. If you succeed, take control of 1 of the clues on Sebastien Moreau. Forced - When the last clue is removed from Sebastien Moreau: Flip this card over and resolve its text.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remember that you "interviewed Sebastien."Flip this card back over to its Bystander asset side.

property.name: Text
property.value: ηη: Parley. You listen to Ashleigh perform. Take control of 1 of the clues on Ashleigh Clarke. Forced - When the last clue is removed from Ashleigh Clarke: Flip this card over and resolve its text.

property.name: Text
property.value: Remember that you "interviewed Ashleigh."Flip this card back over to its Bystander asset side.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aloof. Each investigator at Dianne Devine's location cannot discover or take control of clues. Forced - At the beginning of the enemy phase: Find the Bystander asset with the fewest clues on it. Move Dianne Devine to that asset's location, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation - You must either place 1 of your clues on a Bystander asset in play or take 1 horror and 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Tough Crowd into play next to the agenda deck. Each investigator must spend 1 additional action to parley. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Tough Crowd.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Whispers in Your Head (Anxiety) to your hand. YYou cannot trigger θ abilities. ηη: Discard Whispers in Your Head (Anxiety) from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Whispers in Your Head (Dismay) to your hand. You cannot commit skill cards to skill tests. ηη: Discard Whispers in Your Head (Dismay) from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Whispers in Your Head (Doubt) to your hand. You cannot play events. ηη: Discard Whispers in Your Head (Doubt) from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Hidden. Revelation - Secretly add Whispers in Your Head (Dread) to your hand. You cannot move more than once each turn. ηη: Discard Whispers in Your Head (Dread) from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Surge. Revelation - If you have at least 3 horror on you, lose 1 action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Lowest remaining sanity. Hunter. Retaliate. Forced - When Swift Byakhee would move via the hunter keyword: Instead, move it (one location at a time) until it enters its prey's location. If it moved more than one location by this effect, it does not attack this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test ί (6). If you fail, reveal the top X cards of the encounter deck, where X is the amount you failed by. If at least 1 Byakhee enemy is revealed by this effect, choose and draw 1 of them. If at least 1 Omen treachery is revealed by this effect, take 1 horror. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Massive. While assigning damage and horror from Beast of Aldebaran's attack, you must assign as much damage and horror as possible to a single card before assigning it to another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Most horror. Retaliate. Forced - After you successfully evade Spawn of Hali by 2 or less: Take 1 horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Test έ (4). If you fail, you must either place 1 doom on the current agenda or take 1 horror for each point you failed by. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to your location, then place 2 doom on that location. If there is no doom on attached location, discard Spires of Carcosa. η: Investigate. If you succeed, instead of discovering clues here, remove 1 doom from attached location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If there is no doom in play, Twisted to His Will gains surge. Otherwise, test ά (X), where X is the amount of doom in play. If you fail, discard 2 cards from your hand at random.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be damaged except by Spell, Relic, or encounter cards. η Parley. Test έ (3) to attempt to banish the geist. If you succeed, deal it 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Attach to your location. Forced - After you leave attached location: You must either take 1 horror or lose 1 action. η Place 1 of your clues on attached location: Discard Spirit's Torment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Maniac engages you: Take 1 damage and deal 1 damage to Maniac.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced - After Young Psychopath engages you: You must either take 1 horror, or Young Psychopath gets +3 fight until the end of the investigation phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If there are no Lunatic enemies in play, Dance of the Yellow King gains surge. Otherwise, test ά (3). If you fail, the nearest Lunatic enemy readies, moves (one location at a time) until it reaches your location, engages you, and makes an immediate attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn - Revealed location with the most clues. Forced - After Fanatic enters play: Move 1 clue from Fanatic's location to Fanatic. Forced - When you defeat Fanatic: Take control of all of its clues.

property.name: Text
property.value: Prey - Most clues. Hunter. Forced - After Agent of the King attacks you: Move 1 of your clues to Agent of the King. Forced - When you defeat Agent of the King: Take control of all of its clues.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - For each Cultist enemy in play, move 1 clue from that enemy's location to that enemy. Until the end of the round, each Cultist enemy in play gets +1 fight for each clue and/or doom on it. If no clues are moved by this effect, The King's Edict gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Put Ooze and Filth into play next to the agenda deck. Each location gets +1 shroud. Forced - At the end of the round: Discard Ooze and Filth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - Discard Item assets from play and/or from your hand with a total printed resource cost of at least X, where X is the shroud value of your location. If no cards are discarded by this effect, Corrosion gains surge.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the shroud value of Roach Swarm's location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Peril. Revelation - Test ά (2). If you fail, take 2 horror. If The Man in the Pallid Mask is in play, horror dealt by this effect is considered direct horror, and this test has +2 difficulty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Revelation - If The Man in the Pallid Mask is in play, he attacks each investigator in player order, regardless of his current location. If The Man in the Pallid Mask is not in play, search his bearer's deck and discard pile for him, draw him, and shuffle his bearer's deck (resolve this effect even if his bearer is currently eliminated, searching all out-of-play areas).
